column4: i'm using ubuntu 9.10.  i have a virus that altered my firefox browser. how can i delete firefox and reinstall it?
you can goto your home folder and press ctrl+h and delete the .firefox or mozzila folder! to remove your settings and redo Firefox!
you can goto your home folder and press ctrl+h and delete the .firefox or mozzila folder! to remove your settings and redo Firefox!
just goto your home folder and press ctrl+h then find the folder named .mozilla and delete it! Just Know This will removed all your settings

just goto your home folder and press ctrl+h then find the folder named .mozilla and delete it! Just Know This will removed all your settings, this will fix most issues! that will not be fixed by a simple reinstall!
